ComicInfo.Summary:
The clock is ticking down on Davey Trauma’s apocalyptic pleasure cruise, and what he has planned at midnight won’t just spell doom for New Los Angeles, but the whole world!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|-----------------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Sean Gordon Murphy & Matt Hollingsworth | 1 | | B | Cover B | Rafael Albuquerque | 2 |

ComicInfo.Title: Digital Boy
